code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=_ref=>{let{user,logout}=_ref;const location=useLocation();const isActive=path=>{return location.pathname===path?'active':'';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-brand",children:"\uD83C\uDFEA \u0E23\u0E49\u0E32\u0E19\u0E2D\u0E32\u0E2B\u0E32\u0E23\u0E44\u0E17\u0E22"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:`nav-link ${isActive('/')}`,children:"\uD83C\uDFE0 \u0E2B\u0E19\u0E49\u0E32\u0E2B\u0E25\u0E31\u0E01"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/create-post",className:`nav-link ${isActive('/create-post')}`,children:"\u2795 \u0E41\u0E1A\u0E48\u0E07\u0E1B\u0E31\u0E19\u0E23\u0E49\u0E32\u0E19\u0E04\u0E49\u0E32"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/profile",className:`nav-link ${isActive('/profile')}`,children:"\uD83D\uDC64 \u0E42\u0E1B\u0E23\u0E44\u0E1F\u0E25\u0E4C"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-user",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-info",children:[user.profile_image&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`http://localhost:5000${user.profile_image}`,alt:user.username,className:"user-avatar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"username",children:["\u0E2A\u0E27\u0E31\u0E2A\u0E14\u0E35, ",user.username]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:logout,className:"logout-btn",children:"\u0E2D\u0E2D\u0E01\u0E08\u0E32\u0E01\u0E23\u0E30\u0E1A\u0E1A"})]})]})});};export default Navbar;
